entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [signalr-client-c++] Client does not send access_token for calls after negotiate. #41159
  • Length client side validation of HTML Select isn't working properly #41152
  • .NET SignalR client getting stuck sending messages #41150
  • Request Body as a string. #41145
  • Order KestrelTrace by event ID #41143
  • MetadataTypeAttribute (still) does NOT work for Blazor WASM (.NET 6) #41142

Closed

  • Multiple Authentication Schemes Validation chain behavior #41130
  • The front end text boxes width is minimized after running them this is happening for next 2 weeks #41147
  • [release/6.0.2xx] source-build: Remove *.Razor.*.Tooling.Internal prebuilts #40395
  • Error "View Index.cshtml not found" and also .html caused by missing Packages which were not needed before .net 6.0.2 #40454
  • Blazor Server RuntimeCompilation like in Razor pages #41126

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix component government bugs #41160
    3.1.x
  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #41156
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #41154
    3.1.x
  • Allow specifying authz policies on endpoints #41153
    area-security
  • Update `.vsconfig` to match Visual Studio install script config #41144
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update SiteExtensions versions #41157
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #41155
    5.0.x
  • Revert "Update SDK" #41151
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Update SDK #41136
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Quarantine GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #41075
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    area-web-frameworks
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    area-security, community-contribution
